title: Vase, 1955
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Georgiana L. McClellan
description: Tall, ovoid shape.  Red clay, with matte glaze spattered with blue ranging from dense, blackish at bottom to lighter and more sparse at top.  Inside grayish-white. Signature "JERVIS." (incised)

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, 1955.
1955. earthenware. Museum purchase through gift of Georgiana L. McClellan. 1955-64-2.
